unnormalised: Did you know that the Shipping Corporation of India (SCI) operates several passenger-cum-cargo services? One popular route is Mumbai to Goa, with tickets starting around Rs. 3500. They also have services connecting mainland India to islands like Andaman & Nicobar. The journey from Chennai to Port Blair takes about 2-3 days, covering roughly 1200 km. Check the SCI website for updated schedules and fares. Planning a trip via sea offers a unique experience of the Indian Ocean!
normalised: Did you know that the Shipping Corporation of India (S-C-I) operates several passenger or cargo services? One popular route is Mumbai to Goa, with tickets starting around rupee three thousand five hundred. They also have services connecting mainland India to islands like Andaman and Nicobar. The journey from Chennai to Port Blair takes about two to three days, covering roughly one thousand two hundred kilometer. Check the S-C-I website for updated schedules and fares. Planning a trip via sea offers a unique experience of the Indian Ocean!
